title: Wirsing-Endless Continent-Roosevelt's Fight for World Dominan
description:
For english-only speaking:
This book is in german language. English title would be: The Endless Continent - Roosevelt's Fight for World Dominance (1942). Giselher Wirsing came already in 1944 to a surprising conclusion about America's entrance into World war 2, namely that it wanted to build a new empire (the continuation of British empire) and to use the war to bring Europe to their dominion. But the long-term goal was nothing else than world dominance under American supervision and global control. This fascinating book describes the rise of globalist plutocracy in USA, their background and especially their obsession with war and world dominance during the Roosevelt administration. 200 pages.
